item.description:
Fanta will warmly greet you with her great energy and sincerity. Then starting with some music, some stretches, getting warmed up, she will lead us into an hour of pure fun and exhilaration. Whether you're 4 or 84, Fanta will work with you to hit your goals while having a totally fun time.

Come if you want to learn African dance as well as other, more modern street dance forms. Come if you want to lose a few pounds at lunchtime instead of gaining a few! Meet some really great people!

We can only accept 15 people! Our space is limited at this time. Please RSVP to this Meetup or to fanta@drumconnection.com Thanks!
item.how_to_find_us: Fanta will welcome you with open arms... and a big, warm smile.
item.name: Dance Days Boston - Summer 2009
